turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order one Starbucks Cafe Americano expresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've logged you'd like to order 1 Cafe Americano, and what size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take a small

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like any additional Honey or cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll take 2 packs of Honey

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So we have 1 Starbucks Cafe Americano with 2 Honeys, and which local store would you like to pick up your beverage

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll pick it up from the Starbucks on 7351 Shoppes Drive in Melbourne, FL

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok so you'd like to pick it up from the store on Shoppes Drive in Melbourne, FL?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok we'll start ordering right away, let me know your Starbucks email address and we'll begin ordering right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: My starbucks accout email is abc123@gmail.com.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok am logging in the order information to Starbucks.com

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: *Waits for assistant*

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your order for 1 Cafe Americano and 2 Honeys is now processing at the store, it will be ready in 25 minutes. Shortly a receipt will be sent to your mobile phone via a sms text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything you need assistance with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That'll be all for now Betty thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Enjoy your coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How is the traffic nearby the Starbucks on Shoppes drive?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: There is currently moderate traffic near the Starbucks on Shoppes Drive.
